txt.en: Khânai instructed you to obtain sixteen glands from the spiders in their camp in the eastern stretch of the Cape of Umbar, and you have completed this task. Return the glands to her for your reward.
Collect spider glands from the spiders in the nest on the western edge of the desert north of the expedition camp. When you've collected sixteen of the glands, return the glands to Khânai.
'You will find the spider's brood in the nest on the edge of the desert north of the expedition. Kill the spiders and collect the glands behind the spinnerets where they release their webs.'
Return the spider glands to Khânai at the expedition camp
'You will find the spider's brood in the nest on the edge of the desert north of the expedition. Kill the spiders and collect the glands behind the spinnerets where they release their webs.'
Return the spider glands to Khânai at the expedition camp

You learned that the scholars in Umbar City are attempting to discern how the spiders can create the silk used to construct their webs. They want to collect spider glands to further their understanding.

'I've another request from the scholars of Umbar. An interest in learning the secrets of nature inspires scholars to learn the secret of spinning spider-silk. Scholars believe that careful study of spider glands will provide insight into how the natural process of spinning webs takes place.\n\n'Our task requires we obtain eight pairs of undamaged glands to assist in the scholars' research.'
Return the spider glands to Khânai at the expedition camp
'Such strange-looking organs. I don't know what I expected them to look like... I only know that this does not meet my expectations.\n\n'I shall see these delivered. Thank you, [placeholder].'
